channel.title: Rachel Hallie Art
channel.description: Recent content on Rachel Hallie Art

item.title: Contact/Commission
item.description: If you’re interested in an art or design commission, or would like to enquire about buying a work, feel free to contact me at the following addresses: Phone: 703-232-9698 Email: rachel@rachelhallieart.com

item.title: About the Artist
item.description: Hello, my name is Rachel Hallie Pehrsson! I am an artist and designer currently residing in the lovely city of Lancaster, Pennsylvania. I have a BA Degree in Computer Science and Studio Art from the University of Virginia. I specialize in acrylic and watercolor painting, with additional experience in illustration, digital art, and web design.

item.title: Design and Animation
item.description: .hvrbox, .hvrbox * { box-sizing: border-box; } .hvrbox { position: relative; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; max-width: 49%; height: auto; } .hvrbox img { max-width: 100%; max-height: 100%; } .hvrbox .hvrbox-layer_bottom { display: block; } .hvrbox .hvrbox-layer_top { opacity: 0; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: #2E86C1; color: #fff; padding: 15px; -moz-transition: all 0.4s ease-in-out 0s; -webkit-transition: all 0.4s ease-in-out 0s; -ms-transition: all 0.

item.title: Paintings and Drawings
item.description: 2018 1 / 3 -- Glittering Gold, Acrylic Fluid on Canvas, 18”24 1 / 3 -- Honourable, Acrylic Fluid on Canvas, 32”40 1 / 3 -- Rooms for Young Women, Acrylic Fluid on Canvas, 36”32 1 / 3 -- Midnight Spat, Acrylic Fluid on Canvas 1 / 3 -- Crying Girl, Acrylic Fluid on Canvas, 12”12 2017 1 / 3 -- Indhu, Acrylic Fluids on Canvas, 12"

item.title: Showing Now: 4th Year Exhibition 'Neon Noir'
item.description: An exploration of vibrant colors and dark worlds April 23rd-27th Ruffin Hall 179 Culbreth Rd Charlottesville, VA 22903 Closing Reception Friday, April 23rd-17th 5:30-7:30 pm

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to my new website, where I will post and document my art! Feel free to contact me if you are interested in commission or purchase.
